data.occupation: Senior Software Engineer at Interview Kickstart
data.headline: Creator of @otjs | Senior Software Engineer @ Interview Kickstart | AWS Community Builder | ex-Hackerrank | CSM®
data.summary:
Full Stack Web Application Developer with Specialisation on React/Node & Docker
Vocal About: Hexagonal Architecture | TDD as Best Practice | Code Quality | Architecture First Coding Practice

user_experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
user_experiences.description:
- Actively Hiring and Building Frontend Team from ground-up.
- Creating a culture of Platform-first Development Experience and Product-led Growth initiatives.
- Mentoring Fresh Talents and Onboarding them into Software Development.
- Managing Software Development Lifecycle, Architecture, Infrastructure at scale and Cross-team communication for Frontend Team.

user_experiences.title: Software Development Engineer II
user_experiences.description:
- Built an open source solution @hackerrank/firepad to have collaborative text editing using Monaco as editor. This library powers our own editors and IDE in our Interview platform.
- Designed architecture and led development effort toward building virtual onsite experience for post-Covid Remote Interview setups.
- Designed architecture for Interactive Playback system for reporting user interactions and activities in Interview platform during an interview process for evaluation purposes.
- Conducting interviews for SDE II and SSE roles to upscale Engineering team to continue solving complex problems as they come.
- Built an Open Source tool to extract Type information from library module to help to improve developer experience in consumer applications.
- Continious improvement toward application performance and quality of experience.

user_experiences.title: Lead Software Engineer
user_experiences.description:
Built a hiring platform from scratch to create easy experience for hiring manager for hiring blue-collar job and track their performance.
Was Lead Frontend Engineer and built the product across multiple users and roles with high level of flexibility in UI.
Using best practices and TDD method to create whole software.
Used Technologies: React, Redux, Material Design, RSA Encryption

user_experiences.title: Web Developer
user_experiences.description: Development of official site for Apexcedo, a consultation service for abroad study. Using Material Design principles on grid layout and UX is based on jQuery/Ajax.

user_experiences.title: Project Supervisor
user_experiences.description: Project Supervisor and maintainer of Tech-Mantra, an open source organization. Currently working on on-line smart IDE Molan aimed for students and developers.

user_experiences.title: Web Application Developer
user_experiences.description:
* Worked as a part of development team of cloud based multi-tenant web application that brings an ease of reporting monetary information/regulation in bank systems.
* Design and improve component-driven Reactive web interface in React/Redux with Bootstrap UI.
* Implemented role based functionality and accessibility and maker-checker algorithm for data update.
* Manage and monitor data flow by a common RESTful API service in Flask-Python that utilizes high performance multi-threading and Dataframes.
* Redesigned SQL Database that is structured and distributed among multiple clusters.
user_experiences.location: Easy Daftar, Karunamoyee, Salt Lake, Kolkata

user_experiences.title: Co-Founder
user_experiences.description: Co-founder of Technical Club of West Bengal University of Technology aimed to improve knowledge and quality of IT products across multiple domain including - Software Development, Open Source, Internet of Things, Machine Learning, Competitive Programming etc.

user_experiences.title: Web Developer
user_experiences.description: Creating UI and UX using LAMP Stack for the website.

user_experiences.title: Full Stack Engineer
user_experiences.description:
• UI improvement and fluid event handling in jQuery.
• Core mechanism of notification and mailing using scalable and maintainable trait.
• Creating new functionality for both common users and administrator user.
• Improved security of the application

user_experiences.title: Frontend Web Developer
user_experiences.description:
* Worked as a part of a team to develop next generation teaching tool based on Machine Learning and deployed in Electron Desktop.
* Implemented new features on caching, auto-updating and offline support as well as improved existing on core application in React and jQuery/NodeJS.
* Performed global state management using Redux, creating asynchronous request using Axios and resolving promises using Redux-promise middleware.
* Reactive UI/UX and API binding with WebSocket Channels and RESTful API serivce. Data (structured/unstructured) collection and monitoring for deep learning purpose as well as visualizing the output.
* Worked on Green Sock Animation Plugin and React Transition to create user-friendly UI based on Semantic UI Framework.

usereducation.school: West Bengal University of Technology, Kolkata

useraccomplishmentprojects.title: Operational Transformations
useraccomplishmentprojects.description: A collection of Synchronisation Algorithm and Adapters based upon Operational Transformation

useraccomplishmentprojects.title: storybook-addon-sass-postcss
useraccomplishmentprojects.description: A Storybook plugin/addon that incorporates loaders for External Stylesheets with SASS Language Support and CSS Modules with proper Post processing to support across multiple browser vendor and platforms.

useraccomplishmentprojects.title: babel-plugin-flow-generate-typedef
useraccomplishmentprojects.description: Babel Plugin to Generate Library Definition for Libraries and Modules.

useraccomplishmentprojects.title: MIPS Simulator
useraccomplishmentprojects.description:
* A micro assembler and interpreter written for MIPS Assembly Language for education purpose.
* Modular design for compiler to make it easily manageable, expandable and portable.
* Follows standards for MIPS-IV.
* Current Development: Stack memory allocation.

useraccomplishmentprojects.title: ServerX
useraccomplishmentprojects.description:
* An Open-source HTTP/HTTPS Web Server Handler using Web Socket with parallel Data Processing (MIMD) capabilities.
* Extensive use of multi-threading and dynamic memory allocation.
* Cross-platform compatible with Socket IO.
* Current Development: Keep-Alive Connections.

useraccomplishmentpublications.description: Adapter Pattern is a part of Hexagonal Architecture and it creates interface as your contract with outside world. One can use multiple plugs in multiple sockets with the help of an adapter as mediator.
